creator: Laurie, John Wimburn, 1835-1912. (author)
Canada. Department of Militia and Defence (author)
description: Laurie, John Wimburn: 1835-1912. Born in London; educated at Harrow and Sandhurst; served in Crimea and Indian Mutiny; to Canada, 1861; served in Fenian Raids; second-in-command of force sent to suppress Riel Rebellion; retired from army, 1887; elected to Canadian House of Commons, 1887-1891; elected to British House of Commons, 1895-1906 (Wallace, Dictionary of Canadian biography). // For French version see Peel 1478.
subject: Rebellions and Regimental Histories--Saskatchewan Rebellion

title: Report of Major General Laurie: Commanding base and lines of communication upon matters in connection with the suppression of the Rebellion in the North-West Territories in 1885
